about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: An orange-colored sign like this means:

about.name: An orange-colored sign like this means:

hasPart.assesses: An orange-colored sign like this means: | An orange-colored sign like this means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Orange-colored signs indicate construction areas. Proceed with caution.

answerExplanation.text: Orange-colored signs indicate construction areas. Proceed with caution.

comment.text: An orange-colored sign like this means: | Orange-colored signs indicate construction areas. Proceed with caution.

hasPart.name: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body.

about.name: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body.

hasPart.assesses: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body. | Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body. -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: The only way to sober up after drinking alcohol is to allow time for your body to eliminate the alcohol in your system. Nothing you can do, including eating and drinking, can accelerate this process.

answerExplanation.text: The only way to sober up after drinking alcohol is to allow time for your body to eliminate the alcohol in your system. Nothing you can do, including eating and drinking, can accelerate this process.

comment.text: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body. | The only way to sober up after drinking alcohol is to allow time for your body to eliminate the alcohol in your system. Nothing you can do, including eating and drinking, can accelerate this process.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body. -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body.

hasPart.name: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do?

about.name: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do?

hasPart.assesses: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do? | A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must obey any traffic direction, order, or signal given by a traffic officer, peace officer, or firefighter, even if it conflicts with existing signs, signals, or laws.

suggestedAnswer.text: Do as the officer tells you.

comment.text: Do as the officer tells you.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop first, then do what the officer tells you.

comment.text: Stop first, then do what the officer tells you.

acceptedAnswer.text: Do as the officer tells you.

comment.text: Do as the officer tells you.

answerExplanation.text: You must obey any traffic direction, order, or signal given by a traffic officer, peace officer, or firefighter, even if it conflicts with existing signs, signals, or laws.

comment.text: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do? | You must obey any traffic direction, order, or signal given by a traffic officer, peace officer, or firefighter, even if it conflicts with existing signs, signals, or laws.

hasPart.name: When driving in fog, it is best to drive with:

about.name: When driving in fog, it is best to drive with:

hasPart.assesses: When driving in fog, it is best to drive with: | When driving in fog, it is best to drive with: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Use low beam headlights when driving in fog, rain, or snow. High beams may reflect off of the weather and make visibility even poorer.

answerExplanation.text: Use low beam headlights when driving in fog, rain, or snow. High beams may reflect off of the weather and make visibility even poorer.

comment.text: When driving in fog, it is best to drive with: | Use low beam headlights when driving in fog, rain, or snow. High beams may reflect off of the weather and make visibility even poorer.

hasPart.name: Backing your vehicle is:
hasPart.assesses: Backing your vehicle is: | Backing your vehicle is: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Backing up is always dangerous because it is hard to see behind your vehicle. Use extra caution when backing up.

suggestedAnswer.text: Dangerous if you have a helper.

comment.text: Dangerous if you have a helper.

answerExplanation.text: Backing up is always dangerous because it is hard to see behind your vehicle. Use extra caution when backing up.

comment.text: Backing your vehicle is: | Backing up is always dangerous because it is hard to see behind your vehicle. Use extra caution when backing up.

hasPart.name: When you see this sign, you should stop and:

about.name: When you see this sign, you should stop and:

hasPart.assesses: When you see this sign, you should stop and: | When you see this sign, you should stop and: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: At a stop sign, you must come to a full stop and check for traffic in all directions before proceeding.

suggestedAnswer.text: Check for vehicles only in the direction that you plan on going, then proceed.

comment.text: Check for vehicles only in the direction that you plan on going, then proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Let all vehicles that arrive before or after you go first.

comment.text: Let all vehicles that arrive before or after you go first.

suggestedAnswer.text: Check for traffic in all directions before proceeding.

comment.text: Check for traffic in all directions before proceeding.

acceptedAnswer.text: Check for traffic in all directions before proceeding.

comment.text: Check for traffic in all directions before proceeding.

answerExplanation.text: At a stop sign, you must come to a full stop and check for traffic in all directions before proceeding.

comment.text: When you see this sign, you should stop and: | At a stop sign, you must come to a full stop and check for traffic in all directions before proceeding.
